Articles.Content: This important question must be answered. Please vote in the attached poll.
I pronounce it like the "juole" in "xylophone"
I pronounce it as it's written. How hard can it be.
I pronounce it like Joowhy-is-there-so-much-making-fun-of-other-people's-threads-latelyool.

Like "doom". So with as many O's and broken vocal cords as possible.

4th answer.
It's spelled "Jool", but it's pronounced "Throatwobbler Mangrove".
Sounds like "Jules" (the "s" is invisible). Prone to misquoting Leviticus.
Jewel.
Potato.
I just created a master thread of pronunciations.[Here.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129524-How-do-you-pronounce-different-things)

Clearly, the only proper way to pronounce Jool is much like how Here's what it should sound like: **\*ahem\*** **** **JOO**OOoooOO**OOO**^**OOOÃ‚ÂºÃ‚ÂºÃ‚ÂºOOO**^**OOL!** As option #4 is the only one that vaguely resembles the above, it's probably the best way to say Jool. That's actually a really great way of saying "Jool." I should put it in my signature... -Upsilon

Hot mass of burning death.

a.k.a. The centre of the Kraken's pinball machine.

Happy landings!
I thought JooL is like some emoji of a girl with pony tails and glasses. No?
Rhymes with "drool".
I like your style.
"Hool," obviously. It's Spanish.
I've watched too many Robbaz videos on youtube and can't help pronounce it as "Yule."
"the big green one".

> 
> I pronounce it like the "juole" in "xylophone"

Me too.
Like a Latin name would be pronounced. It's 'jool', not 'dzool' or 'hool'.

Jool is cool, fool. Kick up a stool and you'll drool enough for a pool.

/Jool
Like wool but with a j.
I pronounce it kind of like Jule I guess, though maybe more in between Jule and Jool phonetically.

I think that all right thinking people in this country are sick and tired of being told that ordinary decent people in this country are fed up with being sick and tired. I certainly am not -and I'm sick and tired of being told that I am.

In the interest of preventing General Discussion from becoming Pronunciation Discussion, we are directing all pronunciation talk to the most general of the pronunciation threads here: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129524](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129524)

OP needs to smarten up.

Closed.
